title: Matt Bishop: Jean Alesi's only F1 win in a 13-year career of hard-luck stories
summary: Jean Alesi burst onto the F1 scene in 1989, the start of what looked to be a glittering career. But, writesMatt Bishop, after 201 grands prix, his 1995 victory in Canada remains the only F1 win for a special talent

qa_pairs.question: In which year did Jean Alesi achieve his only Formula 1 victory?
How many Grand Prix races did Jean Alesi compete in during his Formula 1 career?
Which country hosted the Grand Prix where Jean Alesi secured his sole victory?
